name: Baby Girl Beauty Makeover
description:
Discover the world of the beautiful baby girl and begin a fabulous beauty process to make her look even more beautiful. Choose beautiful outfit, dress your baby girl to look more gorgeous. First of all given cool hair spa with different tools like shampoo, shower, hair dryer and more. All the hottest clothes, shoes, bags and dresses are yours to play with in Baby Girl Beauty makeover game. Lots of different makeup and dress up activities for baby girl in this baby girl beauty makeover game. Complete your makeover with amazing Spa and makeover activities. And also enjoy manicure and pedicure treatments with real manicurist tools to shape, cut baby girl nails.

   

Features:

· Clean up Section

· Makeup Section

· Dress up Section

· Hair Spa Section

· Nail Salon section

· Try on dozens of different eye colors, eyeliners, eye-shadows, mascaras, lipsticks, and more

· Plentiful shoes of different styles to choose

· A lot of pretty dresses, tops, skirts to choose  

. Several fantastic stockings to choose

· Take a photo with the girl together

· Screenshots of the girls can be saved in your photo album

· Share the perfect girls via facebook or E-mail with just one click
